Articles.Content:
Hi!

It will be cool to have a newspaper in the game, where articles about all kerbal space program risings and falls can be published, as well as a reaction of Kerbal society on them

Also news about game updates and upcoming events can be delivered to players using this feature.

With best regards,

Pavel.
Yes, this would be pretty cool. Maybe as a "reputation report" under Walt in the Admin Building? Linus and Mortimer could have a graphs and things for their reports.
I like it. How about an old timey radio station that talks about recent events while you're in the VAB / SPH?
Kinda reminds me of Sim City 2000. I like it.

Kinda reminds me of Sim City 2000. I like it.

You mean the news ticker in SimCity 3000? that would be kool!
